Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class acts as the central coordinator for managing lists of students and courses. It provides methods to load data from a file, query students and courses, and convert the lists into formats suitable for display in UI tables.

This class maintains internal StudentList and CourseList objects that hold all student and course data respectively.

  • Constructor Details

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • getStudentListData

      public String[][] getStudentListData()
      Retrieves all student data as a 2D array of Strings formatted for UI display.
      Returns:
      a 2D String array representing all students' data

    • getStudentListData

      public String[][] getStudentListData(String key)
      Retrieves student data filtered by the given key as a 2D array of Strings formatted for UI display. Only students matching the query key are included.
      Parameters:
      key - the search query string to filter students
      Returns:
      a 2D String array of filtered student data

    • getCourseListData

      public String[][] getCourseListData()
      Retrieves all course data as a 2D array of Strings formatted for UI display.
      Returns:
      a 2D String array representing all courses' data

    • getCourseListData

      public String[][] getCourseListData(Student student)
      Retrieves the course data of a specific student as a 2D array of Strings formatted for UI display.
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose courses to retrieve
      Returns:
      a 2D String array of the student's course data

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(String key)
      Finds and returns the first Student object that matches the provided key query.
      Parameters:
      key - the search key to find the student
      Returns:
      the first matching Student, or null if none found

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse(String key)
      Finds and returns the first Course object that matches the provided key query.
      Parameters:
      key - the search key to find the course
      Returns:
      the first matching Course, or null if none found

    • loadData

      public void loadData(String filename) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads student and course data from a file with the specified filename. The file format must follow the expected structure with student and course information. Students can be either Graduate or Undergraduate.
      Parameters:
      filename - the path to the data file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the specified file does not exist

    • studentListToArray

      public static String[][] studentListToArray(StudentList list)
      Utility method that converts a StudentList into a 2D String array with columns: Name, Status, Total Credit Hours, and Tuition Due (formatted with 2 decimal digits).
      Parameters:
      list - the StudentList to convert
      Returns:
      a 2D String array representing the student data

    • courseListToArray

      public static String[][] courseListToArray(CourseList list)
      Utility method that converts a CourseList into a 2D String array with columns: Code, Title, and Credit Hours.
      Parameters:
      list - the CourseList to convert
      Returns:
      a 2D String array representing the course data
